channel.title: Horvik
channel.description: In varrock, were u smith, there is a NPC that normally sells things, but IDK how to get him to work, & when i trade him, U cant see any items. Does any1 know how i can get him to work and put items on him to sell. SRY, IM A NEWB AT THIS

item.title: Horvik
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok most clients for some reaon dont have a 10th shop. if you look in shop.cfg, mine went 8,9,11. so just make a shop: mine looks like this for 9, 10, and 11

[code]shop = 9 Varrock_Swordshop. 2 2 1277 5 1279 4 1281 4 1283 3 1285 3 1287 2 1291 4 1293 3 1295 3 1297 2 1299 2 1301 1 1205 10 1203 6 1207 5 1217 4 1209 3 1211 2

shop = 10 Horvik’s_Armory_Shop 2 2 1089 50 1077 50 1125 50 1165 50 1195 50 1073 25 1091 25 1123 25 1161 25 1199 25 1079 10 1093 10 1127 10 1163 10 1201 10

shop = 11 Lowe’s_Archery_Emporium 2 2 2491 1000 2497 1000 2503 1000 4827 20 2883 20 861 200 859 120 4734 20 4212 10 1478 50 2501 30 2495 30 2499 35 2493 35 1135 40 892 10000

[/code]

Read full topic
